entry.title: WIND WARNING , Okotoks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 at times late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
